USER: [{'tool_use_id': 'toolu_015Gnef2MBbt7SJoxNnzBK6s', 'type': 'tool_result', 'content': 'The file /mnt/Wolf-code/Wolf-Ai-Enterptises/Wolf-Logic-MCP/CLAUDE.md has been updated. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of the edited file:

   621→```bash
   622→source ~/anaconda3/bin/activate messiah && python writers/ingest/swarm_intake_processor.py "<path>"

   624→4. Report results when done
   625→5. Later, semantic search appropriate namespace to access the content
   626→
   627→The keyword `ingest:` is a CIRCUIT BREAKER. It means dispatch, not analyze.'}]
